posts.post_content:
Hello everyone I am trying to find N172 Columbus cards.  If anyone has any for sale please send scans and asking prices to [url]wacturner@hotmail.com[/url] or message me though the boards.  Thanks everyone

William A Turner

There is a Hank Gasterich in Brockleman & Luckey's current auction, a rough Orr in an REA group, and an overpriced Weidner on eBay. Other than those few the rest will need to come from networking here.

I started a Columbus team set (single pose) in January with most of my cards coming from Net54 members. Only have 3 more left to find before I start working on a second pose of each (Weyhing removed since there is only one pose of him).

If I come across any I'll let you know.

Steven
Great Columbus N173 manager card in REA

[quote name="oldjudge" post=1328540]Great Columbus N173 manager card in REA[/QUOTE]

I was hoping no one would see that cabinet :D. the price will probably get a little rich for me.
